attributes.action: Criminal Tax: Convicted Criminals to Pay Added Income/Benefit Tax to Pay for Their Jail Term(s)
attributes.additional_details: To live in jail with home comforts such as TV, Games Consoles etc. Tough time in jail? We UK residents have to pay for a night in hotels - therefore introduce Criminal Tax in order to recover costs for their jail term(s). Another source of income for the Government and less tax weight for me and you.
